name: Super Shapes (Sykey Studios)
description:
Install instructions

This game can be played on any android device just download the ".apk" file and install it on the Android device. You can also play this game on Windows please download the correct build for your machine to install the game. To play the game on Mac OS X download the zip file and unzip it, it contains a ".app" file, launch this ".app" file to play the game.

Please Note: The "Mac OS X" build is still in beta please report any bug which you encounter.

 Thank You for Playing!!
